sentences.en: A company's domicile is the place where the company's administrative body is located.
sentences.cn: 公司的住所是公司主要办事机构所在地.

sentences.en: A legal person's domicile shall be the place where its main administrative office is located.
sentences.cn: 法人以他的主要办事机构所在地为住所.

sentences.en: A person retains a domicile until it is abandoned.
sentences.cn: 个人保留住所直到其更换。

sentences.en: Article 12 A company's domicile is the place where the company's administrative body is located.
sentences.cn: 第十二条公司的住所是公司主要办事机构所在地.

sentences.en: Article 39 A legal person's domicile shall be the place where its main administrative office is located.
sentences.cn: 第三十九条法人以它的主要办事机构所在地为住所.

sentences.en: At my domicile, the Nile Hilton, Fahmy told me what the program would be.
sentences.cn: 在我的住处--尼罗河希尔顿饭店, 法赫来把日程安排告诉了我.

sentences.en: B : My domicile place is Nanning.
His last known domicile was 10 New Street, Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 他最后为人所知的住处在剑桥新街十号.

sentences.en: I thought it better to change my domicile for the present.
Military service entails frequent changes of domicile.
sentences.cn: 服兵役需要频繁更换住所。

sentences.en: My domicile place is Nanjing, too.
Name, domicile of origin , address , residence and occupation of the proxy making the application any.
sentences.cn: 由代理人申请时,代理人之姓名 、 籍贯 、 住 、 居所、职业.

sentences.en: Where is your domicile place ? My domicile place is Nanjing.
You are mentally optimistic and expansive about your family or your domicile now.
sentences.cn: 当前对于家人和居所现状,你是宽容豁达的.
